parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Elected to the Senate for South Australia 2007 (term began 1.7.2008) and 2013.

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Senate Legislative and General Purpose Standing: Legal and Constitutional Affairs from 1.7.08 to 14.5.09; Finance and Public Administration from 16.9.08 to 14.5.09; Education, Employment and Workplace Relations: Legislation and References Committees from 14.5.09 to 5.7.11.
Joint Statutory: Corporations and Financial Services from 11.10.11 to 27.2.12.
Joint Standing: Migration from 27.8.08; Foreign Affairs, Defence and Trade from 4.12.08 to 5.8.13; National Capital and External Territories from 2.12.13.

Joint Select: Christmas Island Tragedy from 3.3.11 to 29.6.11; Australia's Immigration Detention Network from 16.6.11 to 30.3.12; Recent Allegations relating to Conditions and Circumstances at the Regional Processing Centre in Nauru from 26.03.15.

conf.delegations.visits.title: Conferences, Delegations and Visits
conf.delegations.visits.para: Member, Parliamentary Delegation to Denmark, Sweden and Greece, April 2011.

parliamentary.party.positions.title: Parliamentary Party Positions
parliamentary.party.positions.para: Australian Greens Party Room Chair from 1.7.11.

Australian Greens Portfolios: Immigration and Citizenship, Consumer Affairs, Water and the Murray-Darling Basin, Human Rights, Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender and Intersex Issues, Youth, Childhood Education and Care, Tibet from 1.7.11 to 1.7.12; Consumer Affairs, Human Rights, Immigration and Citizenship, Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender and Intersex Issues, Murray Darling Basin, Tibet, Water from 1.7.12 to 11.11.13; Immigration and Citizenship, Consumer Affairs, Water and the Murray Darling Basin, Human Rights, Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender and Intersex Issues, Youth, Early Childhood Education and Care from 11.11.13 to 1.7.14; Early Childhood Education and Care, Immigration and Citizenship, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender and Intersex Issues and Marriage Equality from 1.7.14 to 25.5.15; Immigration and Citizenship, Early Childhood Education and Care; Youth from 25.5.15.

party.positions.title: Party Positions
party.positions.para: Delegate, Australian Greens National Council and Conference 2005-08.
Communications and media officer, Australian Greens (SA) 2006.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Environment Officer, Students' Association of the University of Adelaide 2001-02.
President, Students' Association of the University of Adelaide 2003.
